project_plan.name: Python-based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design and implement a Python-based quiz game that presents multiple-choice questions, tracks the user's score, and displays the final score at the end of the game.

task.name: Implement functionality to display questions to the user
Implement functionality to track the user's score based on their answers
Implement functionality to display the final score to the user at the end of the game
Write tests to verify the functionality of the quiz game
Execute tests on the implemented quiz game features to ensure they function correctly
